This repository documents the network of tree inventory in Central Africa jointly curated and collected since more than a decade by multiple partners:

* French National Research Institute for Sustainable Development, Researchers from the AMAP joint unit

* University of Yaoundé I, Researchers from Professor [Bonaventure Sonké's lab](https://www.researchgate.net/lab/Bonaventure-Sonke-lab)




_NEWS_

* Recent publication using the dataset: [Multiple Stable Dominance States in the Congo Basin Forests](https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4907/11/5/553)
The dataset used in this article can be found in the directory 'datasets'.
